description:
Domon arrives in Neo Hong Kong moments before the deadline. The opening ceremonies start and Domon and the others are surprised to learn that Master Asia is back in his Master Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Fighters Gathered! The Final Battles Begin
Alle Gundam Fighters sind beisammen! Das Finale kann beginnen
La phase finale commence ! La réunion des Gundam Fighters
決勝開幕! ガンダムファイター大集合
